text: @OliverDowden NO he didn't!  The rules are really very simple.  If anyone in a household shows COVID-19 symptoms, the whole house hold needs to self-isolate in that home.  Re-think or 111 / 999 if situation gets unmanageable,but the situation never did! Journey absolutely unnecessary.
